"I communicated with him not to long ago, he has what we need, he 
just said he wanted to check something out at the base. The Ark I 
believe he called it." Veratis was throwing in words and facts he was 
sure she knew. Outside the link he monitored the different reactions 
his words received.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She now understood what was going on and started to relax. But 
> something still bothered her.  Unless this bot that was helping 
them 
> was a maximal, she knew she would be expected to repay Veratis back 
> for his efforts in helping them.  She could only imagine what that 
> kind of payback Veratis might want.  She suddenly felt cold and 
> started to feel drained.  She still had to hang on untill Lunarine 
> returned.  She made a promise to never leave him and she wasn't 
about 
> to break it now. "when do you expect Luanrpine to return?" her 
spark 
> jumped as the thought of being stuck here without him crossed her 
> mind.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Veratis was trying to word together the proper response in 
> > understandable terms.
> > 
> > "I had to remove your spark from Lunarpines, you are in a newborn 
> > protoform, The DNA scanners are trying to assimilate the DNA I 
> > imprinted and programmed to reject it. When Lunarpine returns 
your 
> > owl DNA will be the secondary scan. Since your form won't accept 
> the 
> > primary form it'll pick the secondary. You will be reborn and 
> > flightworthy in no time." He didn't expect her to fully 
> > understand,Protoforms don't usually have thier instincts and 
grasp 
> of 
> > reality until thier transformed. He'd hoped that since she was 
> > already activated that her logic systems were fuly operational.
> >
